nodeDescription.value: Creates a user in PingOne using their email as the username

Account Created

Thanks for signing up. Your account has been created. You may now use your registered device to sign on.

Thank You!

We've sent an email containing a verification code to your email address. Enter the code to verify your email address and finish creating your account.

nodeDescription.value: Starts FIDO device registration using WebAuthn API

customHTML.value:
<form
  id="webAuthnSupportForm"
  method="post"
>
  <input
    type="hidden"
    name="webAuthnSupport"
    id="webAuthnSupport"
  />
  <button
    type="hidden"
    data-skcomponent="skbutton"
    data-skbuttontype="form-submit"
    class="hidden-button"
    data-skbuttonvalue="submit"
    data-skform="webAuthnSupportForm"
    id="webAuthnSupportSubmitBtn"
  ></button>
</form>
